column4: I am trying to install ubuntu on an external hard drive. Where do I tell it to install grub if my external hard drive is sdb?
ifireball- but that will install grub on my main hard drive wont it? I want to install grub to my external harddrive which is sdb.
We understand that... Just pointing out that the drive numbers start with 0 so your second drive number would be hd1 for sdb
